Computer Graphics · Computer Vision

Seungmin Lee

Undergraduate Student · Seoul National University

I am an undergraduate student in Computer Science and Engineering at Seoul National University, and a research intern at the 3D Vision Lab in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, advised by Prof. Youngmin Kim.

My research focuses on computer graphics and computer vision, particularly on realistic and abstract 3D scene reconstruction.
